gen3_pokemon_1.png.name: Absol
gen3_pokemon_1.png.description: Absol appears in areas where disasters are about to happen, warning people in advance.

gen3_pokemon_2.png.name: Altaria
gen3_pokemon_2.png.description: Altaria dances elegantly in the sky, singing melodies that soothe the soul.

gen3_pokemon_3.png.name: Azurill
gen3_pokemon_3.png.description: Azurill bounces on its tail like a ball, spreading joy wherever it goes.

gen3_pokemon_4.png.name: Breloom
gen3_pokemon_4.png.description: Breloom's punches are as fast as bullets, and its spores can put enemies to sleep.

gen3_pokemon_5.png.name: Carvanha
gen3_pokemon_5.png.description: Carvanha has a savage temperament, attacking anything that enters its territory.

gen3_pokemon_6.png.name: Clamperl
gen3_pokemon_6.png.description: Clamperl's shell is incredibly strong, protecting it from predators.

gen3_pokemon_7.png.name: Claydol
gen3_pokemon_7.png.description: Claydol is an ancient Pokémon said to have been created from clay idols.

gen3_pokemon_8.png.name: Corphish
gen3_pokemon_8.png.description: Corphish is a hardy Pokémon that thrives in polluted waters where others cannot.

gen3_pokemon_9.png.name: Duskclops
gen3_pokemon_9.png.description: Duskclops' body is a black hole that absorbs anything that gets too close.

gen3_pokemon_10.png.name: Flygon
gen3_pokemon_10.png.description: Flygon creates sandstorms by flapping its wings, earning it the title 'Desert Spirit.'

gen3_pokemon_11.png.name: Gardevoir
gen3_pokemon_11.png.description: Gardevoir has the ability to sense its Trainer's emotions and protect them with its life.

gen3_pokemon_12.png.name: Latias
gen3_pokemon_12.png.description: Latias is highly intelligent and can communicate telepathically with humans.

gen3_pokemon_13.png.name: Latios
gen3_pokemon_13.png.description: Latios can fly faster than a jet and is known for its protective nature.

gen3_pokemon_14.png.name: Ludicolo
gen3_pokemon_14.png.description: Ludicolo becomes more energetic and playful when it hears festive music.

gen3_pokemon_15.png.name: Lunatone
gen3_pokemon_15.png.description: Lunatone absorbs energy from the moon, glowing faintly under its light.

gen3_pokemon_16.png.name: Makuhita
gen3_pokemon_16.png.description: Makuhita trains tirelessly to build its strength, never giving up no matter the odds.

gen3_pokemon_17.png.name: Mawile
gen3_pokemon_17.png.description: Mawile uses its huge jaws as a weapon to intimidate and trap its foes.

gen3_pokemon_18.png.name: Milotic
gen3_pokemon_18.png.description: Milotic is said to be the most beautiful Pokémon, calming conflicts with its aura.

gen3_pokemon_19.png.name: Minun
gen3_pokemon_19.png.description: Minun cheers on its teammates with spark-filled enthusiasm, boosting their morale.

gen3_pokemon_20.png.name: Mudkip
gen3_pokemon_20.png.description: Mudkip can move boulders larger than itself using its powerful tail.

gen3_pokemon_21.png.name: Ninjask
gen3_pokemon_21.png.description: Ninjask moves so quickly it becomes almost invisible to the human eye.

gen3_pokemon_22.png.name: Numel
gen3_pokemon_22.png.description: Numel stores magma in its body, using it to fuel its attacks.

gen3_pokemon_23.png.name: Plusle
gen3_pokemon_23.png.description: Plusle's positive energy boosts its partners during battle, making it a great team player.

gen3_pokemon_24.png.name: Poochyena
gen3_pokemon_24.png.description: Poochyena's strong sense of smell allows it to track its prey over great distances.

gen3_pokemon_25.png.name: Roselia
gen3_pokemon_25.png.description: Roselia's flowers have a pleasant aroma, but their thorns are highly toxic.

gen3_pokemon_26.png.name: Sableye
gen3_pokemon_26.png.description: Sableye lurks in caves, eating gems and scaring intruders with its glowing eyes.

gen3_pokemon_27.png.name: Shiftry
gen3_pokemon_27.png.description: Shiftry controls the wind with its leafy fans, often appearing in forest legends.

gen3_pokemon_28.png.name: Skitty
gen3_pokemon_28.png.description: Skitty is curious and playful, often chasing its own tail.

gen3_pokemon_29.png.name: Slakoth
gen3_pokemon_29.png.description: Slakoth spends most of its time sleeping, conserving energy for rare bursts of activity.

gen3_pokemon_30.png.name: Solrock
gen3_pokemon_30.png.description: Solrock's body glows with sunlight, which it uses as a source of power.

gen3_pokemon_31.png.name: Spoink
gen3_pokemon_31.png.description: Spoink bounces on its tail to keep its heart beating, never stopping for long.

gen3_pokemon_32.png.name: Taillow
gen3_pokemon_32.png.description: Taillow is brave and will stand up to powerful opponents without backing down.

gen3_pokemon_33.png.name: Torchic
gen3_pokemon_33.png.description: Torchic's flames keep it warm, and it loves to be close to its Trainer.

gen3_pokemon_34.png.name: Torkoal
gen3_pokemon_34.png.description: Torkoal burns coal inside its shell, releasing thick black smoke when attacked.

gen3_pokemon_35.png.name: Treecko
gen3_pokemon_35.png.description: Treecko is cool and calm, scaling walls with ease to protect its territory.

gen3_pokemon_36.png.name: Wurmple
gen3_pokemon_36.png.description: Wurmple loves eating leaves and will evolve depending on its diet.
